guardian.title: Netanyahu trip to Congress provokes harsh reaction from US Jewish leaders
guardian.topComment: Netanyahu has clearly pushed his luck too far this time. We Irish empathise with any oppressed people...that's what 800 years of English colonial rule will do! I think it's fair to say that the Palestinians are getting a huge amount of support from E...
